descricao: Expected Outcome:This topic aims at supporting activities that are enabling or contributing to overcoming sectorial demand fragmentation and support scale up of the space data[1] use, increasing the wider uptake and mass adoption of the EU space data in selected priority areas that are strategic for Europe.
